document_data.mainbody:
izmatec was the glabrezu that acted as the balor Errtus second-in-command, and was sent to the Material Plane to help Matron Baenre in her quest to take Mithral Hall, while Errtu was still under his banishment.
CategoryGlabrezus
CategoryInhabitants of the Abyss
